p: We implemented a surface energy balance model (EBM) using source code derived from the open-source DEBAM of Hock and Holmgren 29 and Reijmer and Hock 66 designed specifically for glaciated environments. Below, we give a brief overview of the EBM approach within DEBAM and highlight DEBAM customizations and routines specific to our implementation. We did not execute the EBM in a spatially distributed manner, but instead utilized its routines to investigate point mass balances.
